Body: Possible Duplicate:  Cannot unlock tablet as have no internet connection?  I have had a very unfortunate accident with my Samsung Galaxy S2 and the screen has suffered a complete shatter (top to bottom! - was closed in a car door)I have downloaded and am running Droid@Screen to make sure the phone itself isn't damaged and can see that the screen is sat on the pattern lock screen. Is there a way I can simulate a touchscreen input from the PC?I just need to unlock the screen then can use Kies Air to remove all of my pics and videos and important files.Any help would be appreciated, I really need to get these files off :(
Title: Simulate Touchscreen Input On Android?

history.Text: I have had a very unfortunate accident with my Samsung Galaxy S2 and the screen has suffered a complete shatter (top to bottom! - was closed in a car door)I have downloaded and am running Droid@Screen to make sure the phone itself isn't damaged and can see that the screen is sat on the pattern lock screen. Is there a way I can simulate a touchscreen input from the PC?I just need to unlock the screen then can use Kies Air to remove all of my pics and videos and important files.Any help would be appreciated, I really need to get these files off :(Thanks in advance
